477840.name: Funklift Soundtrack
477840.description:
Experience the beat

Electronic dance music meets funky rhythms in a tripped out warehouse rave, it's a couch concert like you've never experienced it before!
Intensify your party-vibes and have the energy crash through the ceiling with the official Funklift Soundtrack!

The soundtrack includes 10 unique and original songs by Per-Emil "limE^reP" Fritzén and Magnus "PreAmbience" Heimonen.

Track list

1. Get Moving (3:18)
2. Start Your Engines (3:03)
3. Triplet Lift (3:01)
4. Get Li(f)t (3:23)
5. Industrial Fork (3:05)
6. Forkin' Funky (3:39)
7. Drum N' Boss (3:30)
8. Warehouse Dancefloor (3:13)
9. Funktioning (3:40)
10. Funktastic Vibes (3:20)
